review.title: “It's okay if all else fails.”
review.pros: Pros – Money if you want to work 70 hours/week
review.cons: Cons – No recognition. General feeling of employees are lucky to be working her. Never any thanks for a job well done. Management is not chosen based on talent, but how cheap they can be had for.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Say Thank-you! Value those who work for you! You didn't get here all by yourself.
